node.title: Senator with family at centre of NT outbreak says situation is 'worst fears realised for First Nations people'
node.alt: Malarndirri McCarthy, wearing red, looks straight down the barrel. Aboriginal art is visible on the walls behind her.
node.description: Malarndirri McCarthy callsÂ on the federal government to immediately address overcrowding issues among Aboriginal populations threatened by the current NT COVID outbreak.
node.content:
["NT senator Malarndirri McCarthy, who yesterday revealed 10 of her family members have been infected with COVID-19, says the developing situation in the Northern Territory is the \"worst fears realised for First Nations people\".", "Katherine and Robinson River today entered a\u00a0second full day of lockdown, with concerns about a growing cluster spanning the town and the community, which is\u00a0hundreds of kilometres away.", "Yesterday, Senator McCarthy confirmed that 10 of\u00a0the\u00a0positive cases related to the Katherine and Robinson River outbreak were also her family members.", "\"This is our worst fears realised in terms of First Nations people being infected with COVID,\"\u00a0Senator McCarthy told ABC News Breakfast this morning.", "\"It is something that our First Nations Labor caucus has raised consistently over the last two years. And to now see that it's actually impacting quite personally here at home is quite devastating.", "\"I have been speaking with quite a number of my cousins who were evacuated from Katherine and they have been double vaccinated.", "\"So I'm enormously proud of the fact that they are double vaccinated and I know they're in the right place in terms of Howard Springs.\"", "Yesterday Senator McCarthy urged the federal government to address concerns about overcrowded housing in remote communities with \"absolute\u00a0urgency\".", "\"This is a serious matter. This is a case of life and death here,\" she said.", "This morning she said overcrowding was a \"massive issue\".", "She said it would accelerate the outbreak of COVID-19 in the Aboriginal population if not addressed.", "\"We've been fearing it \u2026 and it's hit quite dramatically here,\" she said.", "\"Housing on homelands and communities is absolutely essential.", "\"How can people isolate when they're 15 to 20 people to a house?\"", "Last night Shadow Indigenous Affairs Minister Linda Burney said the federal government should have done more to assist\u00a0remote Northern Territory communities\u00a0before COVID-19 reached them.", "\"When\u00a0you think about the health challenges and the overcrowding facing remote Aboriginal communities it is doubly\u00a0concerning,\" she said.", "Senator McCarthy said a vacuum in appropriate public health messaging earlier this year allowed misinformation, including misinformation spread by Liberal-National backbenchers, to flow into remote communities, hindering vaccination rates.", "\"As you know, we have got over 100 Aboriginal languages just here in the Northern Territory, more across Australia, and the first time really that First Nations media received funding was in September,\" she said.", "\"So there was this massive gap between February and September when there should have been messaging out there.", "\"In the meantime, that gap was being filled by misinformation, from overseas right-wing extremists but also from the backbenchers of Scott Morrison's government.\"", "Issues with the\u00a0remote vaccine\u00a0rollout\u00a0have\u00a0persisted\u00a0in communities across the Northern Territory, in clinics run both by NT Health and the federally funded Aboriginal community-controlled sector.", "In October\u00a0the federal government gave funding to the\u00a0Central Australian Aboriginal Congress to run an eight-week vaccination acceleration program, allowing it to hire\u00a0Aboriginal community engagement officers and\u00a0extra nurses.", "The month before, Indigenous Australians Minister Ken Wyatt announced extra funding for First Nations media groups to help promote vaccine uptake and combat misinformation.", "At a press conference launching a\u00a0new communications campaign in Western Australia yesterday, Mr Wyatt said he shared concerns about the risks posed by misinformation and poor living conditions.", "He also acknowledged concerns about overcrowding, but said\u00a0responsibility for remote housing was shared with states and territories.", "\"Overcrowding is a major issue in some of the remote communities,\" he said.", "\"There are housing programs that the Commonwealth has previously funded but the state and territories have an obligation also to look at housing within Indigenous communities.\"", "
Biosecurity zones return to NT
", "This morning the federal government\u00a0implemented\u00a0biosecurity zones covering Robinson River and\u00a0surrounding homelands.", "In a statement, Health Minister Greg Hunt said\u00a0he\u00a0made the determination under the Commonwealth Biosecurity Act\u00a0to prevent anyone from entering or exiting the area.", "He said\u00a0the determination was requested by the NT government to supplement its own lockdown restrictions.", "Remote Northern Territory communities were first placed under the Biosecurity Act to prevent the spread of coronavirus in March last year.", "", "
